::Smokescreen/Firearm::

Smokescreen shruggs. "I have no idea further than the fact that you 
were taken over. But I'm also curious about Striker..."

Smokescreen looks at Firearm questioningly. Firearm raises an 
eyebrow, looking at the two bots.

"Hey, I don't know much either. He flew into the battlefield, nearly 
killed Ramulus, made a big mess of the ground with a dozen or so 
missiles, killed a Maximal warrior, called himself Slayer, and flew 
off with the rest of the Trainers. Other than that, I'm as clueless 
as you guys."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> She looked at Smokescreen. She couldn't believe her audio 
> sensors. "Really? I was serving them? How? I don't remember 
anything 
> after fighting them just outside the ark." She watched as Firearm 
> walked in carrying another bot and watches as he puts the bot in 
the 
> CR chamber. Then it hit her as to what he said about Striker. Her 
> spark jumped. She didn't want to lose him. "What about Striker? 
> What's happened? He's been reprogrammed? How? When did that 
happen?" 
> She sat down in the chair next to the chamber with a look of shock 
on 
> her face.  She couldn't remember what had happened and was scared 
and 
> confused.
